page.title: 06Steeple Barton
page.content: There is no doctor's surgery or clinic. Most people are registered with the doctors at Deddington Health Centre to which a minibus service operates twice weekly. The area is within the Oxfordshire Area Health Authority. Home helps give assistance to sick or disabled people in their own homes. A meals on wheels service is provided for the sick and disabled on a twice weekly basis. Most of the children attend the primary school in Middle Barton and younger children go to the Middle Barton playgroup. Buses take the older children to Chipping Norton School.
